ygData.subject: question re: splitpaw (semi sonic spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I got a gnoll hide lariat last night from splitpaw, stats are 3 dam 20 delay magic war rog ran brd ac 3 effect stun.  Sounded like a great off hand weapon to
ygData.messageBody:
I got a gnoll hide lariat last night from splitpaw, stats are 3 dam 20 delay
magic war rog ran brd ac 3 effect stun. Sounded like a great off hand
weapon to me, better yet its a whip that cracks every 2 seconds much to the
agony of my group (big grin), but then again I'm a sucker for procs (hence I
actually would admit to desperately wanting Crookstinger, but I saw another
poisoning weapon drops in splitpaw too...a 10/38 1hs strong poison). Its
not lore, so who knows I might try and get another to REALLY liven things up
with the sound of whip cracking rawhide.

One problem: my will is insufficient. :P

Anyone else got one and know what level it starts making mobs REALLY mad at
me?

Thanks,
-GW
<Tork@Nameless>
